text: where's the best place to submit possible bugs for the new design manager?
invited you to the channel for the design manager v2 feedback
Anyone that has feedback on the new Design Manager, feel free to join the room: <#C960Q64G4|design-manager>.

I have to disagree here from my perspective. The businesses we work with have very little objection to the cost. If you start to move staging, hubdb etc externally and give it away for free I think you would see a sharp drop off in people purchasing those and as developers we have to then ask clients to buy these tools which do not benefit the client but benefit us instead. I think its fine the way it is and that these one cases are a small portion and there isnt concern
